title: Influence of Tritium Exposure Route on Vegetation Types at the Savannah River Site
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00311J, Paper
Martine C. Duff, Elizabeth A Pettitt, Holly VerMeulen
Plant, soil, water, and other media from various locations at the Savannah River Site were measured for total tritium (T) content and T speciation to characterize T in these areas,...
